TestCase.CaseDescription: Create Admin user, admin user with roleId=1
TestCase.SQLScript: delete from Users where roleId = 1; insert into Users (userId, email, firstname, lastname, password, roleId, majorId) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e297', 'admin@cmpe272.com', 'admin', 'admin', PASSWORD('123abcd'), 1, 1);
